description: Stores information about compound ingredients for purposes of prescription claims adjudication.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: O_CMPND_PROD_Q_ID
columns.description: Product identification of an ingredient used in a compound.

columns.name: O_CMPND_PROD_Q_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: O_CMPND_PROD_ID
columns.description: Product identification of an ingredient used in a compound.

columns.name: O_CMPND_INGR_QTY
columns.description: Amount  of the product included in the compound mixture (expressed in metric decimal units).

columns.name: O_CMPND_INGR_COST
columns.description: Ingredient cost for the metric decimal quantity of the product included in the compound mixture indicated in 'Compound Ingredient Quantity' (Field 448-ED).

columns.name: O_CMPND_BAS_COST_ID
columns.description: Code indicating the method by which the drug cost of an ingredient used in a compound was calculated.

columns.name: O_CMPND_BAS_COST_ID_EXT_CODE_LST_NAME
columns.description: The name of the list value.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.
